projects.title: Game of life
projects.description: Conway's game of life with c++ and SDL2. Simple rules can create complicated patterns.

projects.title: ft_printf
projects.description: One of my first C project was about teaching how not to rely on dependencies. So I create my own library: over 50 standard C functions recreated including my own version of printf.

projects.title: FDF
projects.description: 'Fils de fer' is French for wireframe. It uses linedrawing algorithm to visualize a 3D map from 2D height data.

projects.title: Fractol
projects.description: This project explores the endless patterns of fractals. I implemented mandelbrot, julia and the burning ship.

projects.title: RTv1
projects.description: Raytracer version 1. My first raytracer that renders simple 3D shapes in space.

projects.title: RT
projects.description: Another raytracing project. This time with a small team and much more complicated features.
